title: Requirement 1
description: The model shall recognize at least 50 different types of road signs (such as stop sign, yield sign) and achieve an average accuracy of no less than 95% on the standard test set.

Feasible: Requirement may not be achievable with current resources.

title: Requirement 2
description: When the input contains blurred, occluded, or partially damaged road signs, the model shall correctly classify the sign and ensure an accuracy of no less than 85%.

title: Requirement 3
description: In nighttime or low-light environments, the model shall enhance its ability to recognize low-contrast signs and ensure a false detection rate of no more than 5%.

title: Requirement 4
description: The training dataset shall include samples from various weather conditions (e.g., rainy, foggy, and snowy days). The model shall optimize its robustness to environmental changes and maintain a recognition accuracy of at least 90% across all weather conditions.

title: Requirement 5
description: When the input image contains multiple overlapping road signs, the model shall correctly detect and classify each sign to ensure a false detection rate of no more than 3%  on the standard test set.

title: Requirement 6
description: The model shall perform inference on a standard GPU device and ensure that the inference time per frame does not exceed 50 milliseconds.

title: Requirement 7
description: The model shall perform inference on a standard GPU device and ensure that the inference time per frame does not exceed 50 milliseconds.

title: Requirement 8
description: The model shall correctly classify road signs that are subject to degradation, including blur, occlusion, and partial damage, as defined by augmentation techniques, e.g., Gaussian blur (σ ≤ 2), occlusion covering ≤ 30% of the sign, or synthetic damage patterns. The model shall achieve an average classification accuracy of no less than 85% on a designated robustness test set containing such degraded samples.

title: Requirement 9
description: The model shall be capable of recognizing road signs in nighttime or low-light environments, defined as ambient illumination below 1000 lux. The model shall achieve a false detection rate of no more than 5% on low-contrast signs, defined as having a contrast ratio below 0.2.
